item.title: CVE-2024-20011|2024-02-05T05:59:32.380Z -- MediaTek, Inc. -- MT6985, MT8127, MT8135, MT8167, MT8167S, MT8168, MT8173, MT8175, MT8176, MT8183, MT8185, MT8188, MT8188T, MT8195, MT8195Z, MT8312C, MT8312D
item.description: In alac decoder, there is a possible information disclosure due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08441146; Issue ID: ALPS08441146.
